Title: Madame Bovary
Writer: Gustave Flaubert (based on the novel by), Claude Chabrol (adaptation)
Actors: Isabelle Huppert, Jean-François Balmer, Christophe Malavoy, Jean Yanne
Plot: In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
